portfolio.title: Digital Marketing Executive
portfolio.description: Incharge in developing and executing  social media Plateforms driving a surge in website traffic through strategic content creation for IT services. Created content for individuals including HOD’s HR and all technical associates for company’s portfolio. Handled Managed engaging content for diverse social media platform, complemented by impactful posters crafted with tools like Canva. Scheduled And Managed Team and Meetings for Project Management. As technical operations associate: Conducted And Scheduled Knowledge Transfer Session for all Associates, Tracking the meeting and prepared MoM of associates.

portfolio.title: Marketing Manager
portfolio.description: Revived Aircrew Aviation's online presence by creating articles, blogs, and presentations on current aviation affairs, boosting web traffic. Managed social media engagement across Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn, actively contributing to diverse marketing activities. Generated lead through innovative content strategies, leaving a lasting impact on the dynamic landscape of the aviation industry. testimonial.description: Led the charge in crafting and executing comprehensive digital marketing strategies, including SEO, content creation, and social media management for various company and clients, notably Smilepad.  Increased website traffic, Google Analytics, Google tag manager and improved SEO rankings. and fostered strong client relationships, translating their needs into impactful marketing initiatives while overseeing social media platforms for both the company and its clients.
